com.topcoder.uml.actions.project
Class CreateNewProjectAction

java.lang.Object
  com.topcoder.uml.actions.project.CreateNewProjectAction
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.topcoder.uml.actionmanager.Action
public class CreateNewProjectAction
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.topcoder.uml.actionmanager.Action

CreateNewProjectAction class implements Action interface and it will create a new project. It will empty the Model, the list of ActivityGraphs and the list of Diagrams from the UMLModelManager. And it will also set the project language.

Thread-safety: This class is immutable, but it would change it internal state of the UMLModelManager object, so it is not thread-safe.

Version:
1.0
Author:
standlove, TCSDEVELOPER

Field Summary
private  com.topcoder.uml.modelmanager.UMLModelManager manager
           Represents the UMLModelManager object processed by this action in execute method, its internal state would be changed after execution.
private  java.lang.String projectLanguage
           Represents the language of the newly created project used to set to model in execute method.

CreateNewProjectAction(java.lang.String projectLanguage, com.topcoder.uml.modelmanager.UMLModelManager modelManager)

 void execute()
           Creates a new project.

Field Detail

projectLanguage

private final java.lang.String projectLanguage

Represents the language of the newly created project used to set to model in execute method. Initialized in the constructor, and never changed afterwards. It must be non-null, non-empty string.

manager

private final com.topcoder.uml.modelmanager.UMLModelManager manager

Represents the UMLModelManager object processed by this action in execute method, its internal state would be changed after execution. Initialized in the constructor, and this reference is never changed afterwards. It must be non-null.

CreateNewProjectAction

public CreateNewProjectAction(java.lang.String projectLanguage,
                              com.topcoder.uml.modelmanager.UMLModelManager modelManager)

Constructor with the project language and UMLModelManager object.

Parameters:
projectLanguage - the language of the newly created project used to set to model
modelManager - the UMLModelManager object processed by this action
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the modelManager is null. if the projectLanguage is null or trimmed to empty
Method Detail

execute

public void execute()
             throws com.topcoder.uml.actionmanager.ActionExecutionException

Creates a new project. It will empty the Model, the list of ActivityGraphs and the list of Diagrams from the UMLModelManager. And it will also set the project language.

Throws:
com.topcoder.uml.actionmanager.ActionExecutionException - if any exception occurs during the execution, it is mainly used to wrap the all possible underlying exceptions.
